content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals x squared plus 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, and the function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator open parentheses x minus 3 close parentheses over denominator x end fraction"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfrac></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses g open parentheses x close parentheses close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator x cubed minus 3 x squared plus x minus 3 over denominator x end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mi>x</mi></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator x squared minus 2 over denominator x squared plus 1 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator x squared minus 6 x plus 9 over denominator x squared end fraction plus 1"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator x squared minus 8 over denominator x squared end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator x squared minus 6 x plus 9 over denominator x squared end fraction plus 1"><semantics><mrow><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
